description.@en: Unfortunately, the power you wield is highly destructive – not only to others, but also upon your very soul. Bit by bit, your spirit is consumed by the dark sorcery you wield. You begin to develop odd affectations and side effects from using the destructive powers of the blackest Ætheric Winds.

effect.@en: When you Critically Fail an Incantation Test to cast Magick, you gain a Malignancy.
